The alleged victim: Sam Wormer, disputed the claim that the attack was perpetrated by anti-fascist groups, stating that he believed it was a false flag attack by the far right.
Wormer posted a picture on his Facebook: which he claimed came from a box cutter blade, supporting the claim that he was attacked.
Wormer did not describe his attackers as: fascists, even though he was called a "Nazi" and a "fascist" during the attack.
Wormer mentioned that a loosely organize: trying to determine what happened and showing support, suggesting that they were not involved in the attack.
